Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I kindly propose a special introductory price of $180 for you, reflecting its true value and my confidence in its ability to exceed your expectations. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your budget and interests, so we can proceed to discuss further details or any questions you might have. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
